casebody.data:
PDR NETWORK, LLC, et al., petitioners,
v.
CARLTON & HARRIS CHIROPRACTIC, INC. No. 17-1705. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 13, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted limited to the following question: Whether the Hobbs Act required the district court in this case to accept the FCC's legal interpretation of the Telephone Consumer Protection Act.
